Name: Crème de Café
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Coffee predominates over the creaminess with hints of aniseed and rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Crème de Café contains 290 calories
